text:
Reside | Software Engineer / Senior Software Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Fulltime | ONSITE

Reside is building a modern real estate brokerage, with the aim of unseating dinosaur brokerages like Remax and Coldwell-Banker. We are Series A and have ~23 employees. There are 6 folks on the engineering team, so plenty of space to make an impact. We use React, Firebase, and Node and contribute heavily to open source. Reside is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse company.

Interview process: screening phone call, take home challenge, then 4 hour onsite.

Software Engineer: http://grnh.se/3aytm11

Feel free to reach out to me directly, chris@residebrokerage.com
